mapper.select: SELECT challenge_pk, challenge_name, id, challenge_type, target_amount, date_format(challenge_end_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as challenge_end_date FROM user_challenge WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_challenge(challenge_name, id, challenge_type, target_amount, challenge_end_date) VALUES(#{challengeName}, #{id}, #{challengeType}, #{targetAmount}, date_format(date_add(now(), interval +1 month ), '%Y-%m-%d') )
